title: Does Akali really need to deal 118% damage while only taking 82% damage in ARAM?
body: Like come the fuck on, I'm tired of watching this cancer go 40/0 in ARAM because some r%%%%% developer is clueless about their fucking job.

replies.body: Yeah this shit actually gets on my nerves, aram is actually really fun but then you get that one tard who gets akali and goes around two shotting people while tanking as much damage as me on volibear. I had a game where the enemy team was pure cancer, 4 supports and an akali. Eventually we won because we just chain cced akali, but it was pure hell. Not only is this champion overtuned af but it also gets +18% damage -12% damage taken for no reason.
Even with the ARAM buffs she's still one of the worst champions statistically speaking.
Take a deep breath dude; you're just a drop of water in a sea of ranting posts.
Every bit of that sea is just a drop though.

> [{quoted}](name=xelaker,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=LOM4Nw0h,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-09-23T23:28:22.364+0000)
>
> Every bit of that sea is just a drop though.

Exactly, which combines into a sea making his drop look meaningless
Assassins like Akali and Kat can do that, yeah, but then they might lose anyway. Assassins have a tough time in ARAM without a strong team to back them up.
